metadata.title: Domot
metadata.summary: We dey give una latest tori on top politics, environment, business, sports, entertainment, health, fashion and all di oda things wey dey happen for West and Central Africa come add di rest of di world join. For better informate plus explanation of all di ogbonge tori wey pipo never hear about for inside West and Central Africa, BBC Pidgin dey serve am with video, audio, maps and oda graphics join.

headlines.headline: I realise my World Cup dream afta 14 years

items.summary: South Africa captain Janine van Wyk dey lead di Bayana Bayana to go hustle for di Women’s World Cup for di first time ever!

media.title: I dey realise my World Cup Dream afta 14 years

synopses.short: France 2019 Women's World Cup: Janine van Wyk go lead South Africa compete for first time
synopses.long:
Janine van Wyk don play for South Africa Women's team for 14 years. 

But dis summer, for di first di captain go lead di Banyana Banyana go France 2019 World Cup. 

She discuss her dreams, determination and development wit BBC Sport Africa inside dis BBC Africa one minute tori.

Dis na behind dis scenes wit South Africa captain wey dey lead di Bayana Bayana to go husle for di Women’s World Cup for di first time ever!
synopses.medium: Dis na behind dis scenes wit South Africa captain wey dey lead di Bayana Bayana to go husle for di Women’s World Cup for difirst time ever!

media.caption: Janine van Wyk go lead South Africa go di Women's World Cup for di first time.

headlines.headline: “If di spoon attract me, most times na to carry am enta studio” – Collins

items.summary: Dis artist no dey take eye see spoon, as no be to chop food be di only tin him dey use am do.

media.title: “If di spoon attract me, most times na to carry am enta studio” – Collins

synopses.short: “If di spoon attract me, most times na to carry am enta studio” – Collins
synopses.long:
Almost every wia pesin turn you go see art of different kinds but dis one get as e be, unto say na spoon dis pesin take dey do im own work.

Abiniro Collins na Artist for Lagos, south west Nigeria, wey no dey use eye see spoon.

Collins tok say na wen im dey school di idea come, as im bin dey find sometin wey pipo neva too use do art work 

Collins say im dream na to create place wey young artists for Nigeria go fit go to get mentor for dia work.

Producers: Usifo Omozokpea & Sarah Tiamiyu
synopses.medium: Dis artist no dey take eye see spoon, as no be to chop food be di only tin him dey use am do.

media.caption: “If di spoon attract me, most times na to carry am enta studio” – Collins

headlines.headline: Henna Design di natural tattoo

items.summary: Weda na for religion or fashion, henna design na natural way to tattoo bodi witout any wahala.

synopses.long:
Henna, di natural tattoo wey dey important to religion and to fashion don dey exist for many centuries.
Many, many years back for dis part of Africa, pipo believe say na only Muslims fit do henna designs for dia bodi.
Back in dos days women dey do di design especially during Eid celebrations, wedding and naming ceremonies plus oda special occasions. E still be di same reach today.
Islam religion also believe say na only women suppose do henna tattoo for dia bodi as dis go separate dem from di men.
But all dat one don change as henna tattoo don turn fashion and more pipo wey no be Muslims, plus including men sef dey use am make dem sef beautiful.
For most of dis pipo dem prefer to do henna design dan to do oyibo kain tattoo wey dey permanent and no dey eva commot.

Production by Onyinye Chime and Abdulmalik Fahd Abdulmalik, Camera man Gift Ufuoma.
synopses.medium: Weda na for religion or fashion, henna design na natural way to tattoo bodi witout any wahala.

headlines.headline: Di codeine investigation wey change Nigeria

items.summary: Africa Eye chook eye inside di abuse of codeine cough syrup wey turn many Nigerians to addict.

media.title: Di codeine investigation wey change Nigeria

synopses.short: Africa Eye: How one codeine investigation change Nigeria
synopses.long:
BBC Africa Eye tear rubber for April 2018 with Sweet Sweet Codeine, one feem wey Nigerian investigative journalist Ruona Meyer present.

E show di abuse of di cough syrup medicine with codeine wey pipo suppose take afta prescription. Codeine cough syrup bin dey make pipo dey addicted -  millions of young pipo wey dey expose to am na im sabi pipo bin say dey addicted to di syrup.

BBC Africa Eye tori pesin Zuhura Yunus continue di tori of how di codeine story shine light ontop how dem bin dey sell am for black market.
synopses.medium: Africa Eye chook eye inside di abuse of codeine cough syrup wey turn many Nigerians to addict.

media.caption: Africa Eye: How one codeine investigation change Nigeria

headlines.headline: "Dance big pass how pipo dey take see am"

items.summary: Kaffy say if di goment know di importance of dance sef dem go put am for our curriculum.

media.title: "Dance big pass how pipo dey take see am"

synopses.short: Kaffy say if di goment know di importance of dance sef dem go put am for our curriculum
synopses.long:
E don tey wey Kafayat Oluwatoyin aka Kaffy don dey dance sotey she don turn am to business.

Kaffy follow BBC pidgin tok ontop how she take choose dance even though na pesin wey dey fly and repair plane she bin wan become for life before. 

She tok how dance take help her many times for her life “as adult di period of my life wey I tackle depression based on tins wey dey happen for me for inside house, wit di use of dance and di work wey I dey do as dancer, e continue to dey help me to remind me say make you no let your problem to define you” – as she tok.

She feel say pipo suppose dey appreciate dance for Nigeria pass as e dey now and pipo suppose get place wia dem fit go to learn dance if dem wan take am as work just as doctors and lawyers dem too get, “dat na why we say make we create platform like ‘The dance workshop Africa’ wey go empower, train and deal wit di problems wey we dey deal wit as pipo wey dey creative industry” she tok.

Kaffy bin win Guinness world record for “Longest Dance Party" for 2006, she dey married and she get two children wey she say be di biggest achievement for her life.
synopses.medium: Kaffy say if di goment know di importance of dance sef dem go put am for our curriculum.

media.caption: Kaffy say if di goment know di importance of dance sef dem go put am for our curriculum

headlines.headline: Nigeria defend why dem no sign AfCFTA

items.summary: Nigeria goment don explain why di kontri still dey drag leg to sign di Africa Continental Free Trade Agreement.

media.title: Why Nigeria shun Africa Free Trade deal

synopses.short: Africa Continental Free Trade Agreement: Why Nigeria never still sign AfCFTA - Enelama
synopses.long:
Okechukwu Enelamah wey just stop work on May 28 as Nigeria Minister of Trade and Investment don explain why di kontri still dey drag leg to sign di Africa Continental Free Trade Agreement.

Africa free trade agreement don legally start since midnight breaking Thursday May 30 and African Union do confam say e go become big free trade area since weh deh start World Trade Organisation.

Enelamah say no be say Nigeria no wan sign di deal but e give reasons why dey kontri still dey delay until now wey di deal don come into full full.

Nigeria no dey among de 23 out 54 kontris for Africa weh deh confam de agreement weh sabi pipo say e go increase business among African kontris.
synopses.medium: Nigeria Minister of Trade and Investment don explain why di kontri still dey drag leg to sign di AfCFTA deal.

media.caption: Africa Continental Free Trade Agreement: Why Nigeria never still sign AfCFTA - Enelama

media.title: Buhari keep im promise to make di health sector great again?

synopses.short: May 29: President Buhari keep im promise to make di health sector great again?
synopses.long:
Nigeria president Muhammadu Buhari and im All Progressive Congress party promise to revamp di health sector.
Part of im promise na to ensure say no Nigerian go get reason to travel out of di kontri for medical treatment.
Four years down di line, how far with dis promise?

headlines.headline: Exclusive: Why I no want pipo to vote on February 16 - Nnamdi Kanu

media.title: Exclusive: Why I no want pipo to vote on February 16 - Nnamdi Kanu

synopses.short: Nnamdi Kanu: 'Why I no want pipo to vote on February 16'
synopses.long:
Oga of di Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu don tell BBC why e no want make im pipo participate for di 2019 elections for Nigeria.
Inside exclusive interview wey im do wit BBC Igbo, im open mouth about plenti tins, including im proof say Nigeria president Muhammadu Buhari and im opposition Atiku Abubakar no be from Nigerians, plus how im manage escape Nigeria under di nose of military pipo,
synopses.medium: Di leader of di Independent People of Biafra, Nnamdi Kanu, tell BBC say im want make Nigeria goment know say im dem dey serious wit di call for Biafra.

media.caption: Nnamdi Kanu: 'Why I no want pipo to vote on February 16'

headlines.headline: EXCLUSIVE: "Atiku beta pass Buhari two times" #BBCNigeria2019

items.summary: Former president Olusegun Obasanjo don explain give BBC why im dey support Atiku Abubakar ahead of February general elections.

media.title: Day 25: 'Why I forgive Atiku' #BBCNigeria2019

synopses.short: Nigeria 2019 Elections: Why I forgive Atiku - Olusegun Obasanjo
synopses.medium: Former president Olusegun Obasanjo don explain give BBC why im decide to forgive Atiku Abubakar ahead of February general elections.
synopses.long:
Former president Olusegun Obasanjo don explain give BBC News Pidgin why im decide to forgive di main opposition presidential candidate Atiku Abubakar ahead of di 16 February general elections for Nigeria.

'Di choice we get for Nigeria situation today and I dey tok about 2019 na betwwen di candidates of APC party and di candidate of PDP party di odas na minor-minor party wey go line behind dem'

"So if APC bring Buhari and PDP bring Atiku and from wetin I sabi about Buhari... and wetin im don do e show say im no sabi di work, e dey do partial, im dey evil and dey do anyhow even for corruption."

"Evritin about Buhari, I believe say Atiku beta pass Buhari times two" Obasanjo tok.

Already President Muhammadu Buhari on Monday come out say na jealousy dey worry Obasanjo.

media.caption: Nigeria 2019 Elections: Why I forgive Atiku - Olusegun Obasanjo

headlines.headline: Day 23: 'Who be Obasanjo to say Atiku beta pass Buhari?' #BBCNigeria2019

items.summary: Di tok -tok pesin for Nigeria president Muhammadu Buhari Campaign organisation, Festus Keyamo dey react to wetin former presido Olusegun Obasanjo tok say Atiku Abubakar beta pass Buhari two times.

media.title: Day 23: 'Who be Obasanjo to say Atiku beta pass Buhari?' #BBCNigeria2019

synopses.short: Olusegun Obasanjo: Who be OBJ to say Atiku beta pass Buhari? - Keyamo
synopses.long:
Tok-tok pesin for Nigeria president Muhammadu Buhari Campaign Organisation Festus Keyamo say anybody wey tink say di presido head no correct need to go check im own head.

Keyamo tell BBC Pidgin say di presido get im own pattern wey e dey use make im point wen e dey tok.

According to Keyamo, pipo wey dey yab president Buhari because e no go debate dey waste dia time.
E say leadership quality no be debating skills and dat di platform wey Nigeria Election Debate Group create no di suitable for di incumbent to tok dia mind.

Keyamo also chook mouth ontop di 16 page letter wey former President Olusegun Obasanjo write about di elections and Buhari goment tok say just be like tissue paper.
Keyano tok say E say di president dey gidigba and e dey fresh everyday dey do im campaign across di kontri.
synopses.medium: Di tok -tok pesin for Nigeria president Muhammadu Buhari Campaign organisation, Festus Keyamo dey react to accusation against di president by former presido Olusegun Obasanjo say B

media.caption: Olusegun Obasanjo: Who be OBJ to say Atiku beta pass Buhari? - Keyamo

headlines.headline: Day 27: 'As Commander-in-chief my special force go comot confidence from terrorist hand' #BBCNigeria2019

items.summary: Obiageli Ezekwesili dey contest di seat of president for Nigeria 2019 elections, she bin don hold two ogbonge position for di kontri as minister of Education and Solid minerals.

media.title: Day 27:  As Commander-in-chief my special force go comot confidence from terrorist dia hand - Ezekwesili #BBCNigeria2019

synopses.short: Nigeria 2019 elections: I go comot confidence from terrorist hand wen I win - Ezekwesili
synopses.long:
Presidential candidate under di new political party - Allied Congress Party of Nigeria Oby Ezekwesili tell BBC say 
she dey run for goment to lead di citizens of Nigeria  on a journey to rescue di kontri from di political class wey don lead di kontri go back.

Di former mister of Education and Solid minerals don dey road dey campaign since 2014 for goment to bring back di school girls wey boko haram militants dem kidnap from Chibok, Borno state.
She tell BBC say wen she become di Commander-in-chief of di armed forces, she go set up a special force team, 
Chibok Special Force to make sure say any group wey dey carry out terrorist operation no go get mind, dey comfortable for di kontri.
She also believe say plenti Nigerians believe trust am dem say she dey run for presidency to move di kontri forward.
synopses.medium: Obiageli Ezekwesili dey contest di seat of president for Nigeria 2019 elections, she bin don hold two ogbonge position for di kontri as minister of Education and Solid minerals.

media.caption: Nigeria 2019 elections: I go comot confidence from terrorist hand wen I win - Ezekwesili

indexImage.altText: Oby Ezekwesili na Nigeria presidential candidate
